# Orange Revolution (film)__disambig_1

| runtime        = 92 minutes
| country        = United States
| language       = English/Ukrainian/Russian
| budget         =
| gross          =
}}
Orange Revolution (, ) is a 2007 feature-length documentary produced by York Zimmerman Inc. and directed by Steve York capturing the massive street protests that followed the rigged 2004 presidential elections in the Ukraine (a.k.a. the Orange Revolution).
Awards
* 2007 President's Award, Chicago International Documentary Film Festival
* 2007 Bronze Plaque, Columbus International Film Festival
* 2007 Proskar Award for Best Documentary, Seattle International Film Festival

*2009 [http://www.mettacenter.org/events/orange-revolution-film-event-dec-16-in-sf The Metta Center for Nonviolence, Berkeley, CA]
*2009 [http://www.cinemapolitica.org/node/617 University of British Columbia, Canada "Cinema Politica: Screening Truth to Power" Series]
*2009 Cairo Human Rights Film Festival
*2008 [http://www.nwfilm.org/screenings/15/138/ Portland Art Museum]
*2008 [http://www.pon.harvard.edu/events/pon-film-series-orange-revolution/?cid=72 Harvard Law School]
*2007 [https://web.archive.org/web/20110724172934/http://fest07.sffs.org/films/film_details.php?id=77 The San Francisco International Film Festival]
*2007 [https://web.archive.org/web/20100525110821/http://www.docnz.org.nz/2007/wgtn/film/orange-revolution DOCNZ Film Festival, New Zealand] Asia Pacific Premiere
